channel.title: Released - Openscape
channel.description:
[size=17pt][b]OpenScape - Designed by KodeJAVA[/b][/size]
[b]What is Openscape?[/b] [code]Openscape is a opensource runescape code, witch i am developing to be almost excatly 100% like runescape.[/code]
[b]What version?[/b] [code]I havent given my updates version number so this would be version 1.[/code]
[b]Updates[/b] [code] * Update: Load Spells, runes and GFX from CFG * Update: Load Weapons and Emotes from CFG (Diffrent attack emotes for attack styles) * Update: Load Areas from CFG * Update: Dwarf Cannons 75% Cannon Rotates and fires in direction faceing * Update: pVp Hit Chance added (Means You wont hit every time if they got 99 def and you have 90 attack) * Update: pVp Team / nonTeam made. (I beleave this is the first 100% Non-Team and Team code) * Update: working Protect Melee, Range, Mage with hit chance (addeds 40 to hit chance so you are harder to hit but still hittable) * Update: keep Dwarfcannons when setup and loged out (YAY) * Update: Dragons Have DragonFire!! (Only a dragon fire Shield can save you) * Update: Pk Portals added! * Update: All npcs have attack Str def levels and MeleeDefBonus, MagicDefBonus, RangeDefBonus * Update: REMOVED TUTORIAL ISLAND DUE TO tutorial island completion bar crashes some clients
[/code]
[b]Where is the Test Server?[/b] [code]Im not gonna give a static Address But ill update when it is on or not[/code] THere is NO TESTING SERVER
[center][size=12pt][b] .: DOWNLOAD[/b][/size] [/center] [center][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=150504.0;attach=9357]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=150504.0;attach=9357[/url][/center]

item.title: Released - Openscape
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

[size=17pt]OpenScape - Designed by KodeJAVA[/size]

What is Openscape?

Openscape is a opensource runescape code, witch i am developing to be almost excatly 100% like runescape.

What version?

I havent given my updates version number so this would be version 1.

Updates

[code] * Update: Load Spells, runes and GFX from CFG

  • Update: Load Weapons and Emotes from CFG (Diffrent attack emotes for attack styles)
  • Update: Load Areas from CFG
  • Update: Dwarf Cannons 75% Cannon Rotates and fires in direction faceing
  • Update: pVp Hit Chance added (Means You wont hit every time if they got 99 def and you have 90 attack)
  • Update: pVp Team / nonTeam made. (I beleave this is the first 100% Non-Team and Team code)
  • Update: working Protect Melee, Range, Mage with hit chance (addeds 40 to hit chance so you are harder to hit but still hittable)
  • Update: keep Dwarfcannons when setup and loged out (YAY)
  • Update: Dragons Have DragonFire!! (Only a dragon fire Shield can save you)
  • Update: Pk Portals added!
  • Update: All npcs have attack Str def levels and MeleeDefBonus, MagicDefBonus, RangeDefBonus
  • Update: REMOVED TUTORIAL ISLAND DUE TO tutorial island completion bar crashes some clients

[/code]

Where is the Test Server?

Im not gonna give a static Address But ill update when it is on or not

THere is NO TESTING SERVER

[center][size=12pt] .: DOWNLOAD[/size] [/center]
[center]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=150504.0;attach=9357[/center]

Read full topic
